column5: i know trout season is over sept 30..but why do people still keep them when they fish in tribs or the mouth of lake huron?...where does this apply
I've been dying for some rainbows since june!!  how dare you say the season is over
i have read the regs but people still take them..is it because theya re from lake ont,huron
Read the exceptions/extended seasons for fall trout fishing in your region.
yep.. .gotta read " the exceptions"..  The tribs ARE closed but not the main rivers off Huron... READ THOSE REGS
